scripts.dep: ((cd client && npm i) && cd ../server) && npm i
scripts.mobile: start cmd /k "cd mobile && npm run start"
scripts.web: start cmd /k "cd server && npm run start" & start cmd /k "cd server && npm run socket" & start cmd /k "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.webDev: start cmd /k "cd server && npm run startDev" & start cmd /k "cd server && npm run socketDev" & start cmd /k "cd client && npm run start"
